title: The Canadian experience on pediatric liver disease: Early diagnosis is critical (University of Ottawa)
text: ( Source : University of Ottawa ) OTTAWA, October 19 , 2015 - A first-of-its-kind national study on pediatric Autoimmune Hepatitis ( AIH ), a progressive inflammatory liver disease, was released today in the esteemed journal, Pediatrics. Under
